add_library(fmt STATIC src/format.cc)
target_include_directories(fmt PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

install(
    TARGETS fmt
    EXPORT  armnn-targets
    LIBRARY DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}
    ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}
)
